name: Skyward Atlas
title: Cloud Atlas: Skyward Atlas
desc: Its full name is the "An atlas of the winds and clouds."\nThis text records the winds and clouds of the northern lands' skies in poetic and archival forms.
in_play_description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.

skills.desc: The character deals +1 DMG. Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG. (Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
